verses.verse: Now Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> was old <WH2204> <WH8804> and stricken <WH935> <WH8804> in years <WH3117>; and the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thou art old <WH2204> <WH8804> and stricken <WH935> <WH8804> in years <WH3117>, and there remaineth <WH7604> <WH8738> yet very <WH3966> much <WH7235> <WH8687> land <WH776> to be possessed <WH3423> <WH8800>.
This is the land <WH776> that yet remaineth <WH7604> <WH8737>: all the borders <WH1552> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and all Geshuri <WH1651>,

From Sihor <WH7883>, which is before <WH6440> Egypt <WH4714>, even unto the borders <WH1366> of Ekron <WH6138> northward <WH6828>, which is counted <WH2803> <WH8735> to the Kanahanite <WH3669>: five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>; the Gazathites <WH5841>, and the Ashdothites <WH796>, the Eshkalonites <WH832>, the Gittites <WH1663>, and the Ekronites <WH6139>; also the Avites <WH5761>:

From the south <WH8486>, all the land <WH776> of the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and Mearah <WH4632> that is beside the TZidonians <WH6722>, unto Aphek <WH663>, to the borders <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567>:

And the land <WH776> of the Giblites <WH1382>, and all Lebanon <WH3844>, toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121>, from Baalgad <WH1171> under mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768> unto the entering <WH935> <WH8800> into Hamath <WH2574>.

All the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the hill country <WH2022> from Lebanon <WH3844> unto Misrephothmaim <WH4956>, and all the TZidonians <WH6722>, them will I drive out <WH3423> <WH8686> from before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: only divide thou it by lot <WH5307> <WH8685> unto the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> for an inheritance <WH5159>, as I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee.
Now therefore divide <WH2505> <WH8761> this land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> unto the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH7626>, and the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519>,

With whom the Re'uvenites <WH7206> and the Gadites <WH1425> have received <WH3947> <WH8804> their inheritance <WH5159>, which Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> them, beyond <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>, even as Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> them;

From Aroer <WH6177>, that is upon the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769>, and the city <WH5892> that is in the midst <WH8432> of the river <WH5158>, and all the plain <WH4334> of Medeba <WH4311> unto Dibon <WH1769>;

And all the cities <WH5892> of Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, which reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> in Heshbon <WH2809>, unto the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>;
And Gil`ad <WH1568>, and the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and Maachathites <WH4602>, and all mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768>, and all Bashan <WH1316> unto Salcah <WH5548>;

All the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>, which reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> in Ashtaroth <WH6252> and in Edrei <WH154>, who remained <WH7604> <WH8738> of the remnant <WH3499> of the giants <WH7497>: for these did Mosheh <WH4872> smite <WH5221> <WH8686>, and cast them out <WH3423> <WH8686>.

Nevertheless the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> expelled <WH3423> <WH8689> not the Geshurites <WH1651>, nor the Maachathites <WH4602>: but the Geshurites <WH1650> and the Maachathites <WH4601> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH7130> the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> until this day <WH3117>.

Only unto the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> none inheritance <WH5159>; the sacrifices <WH801> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> made by fire <WH801> are their inheritance <WH5159>, as he said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> inheritance according to their families <WH4940>.

And their coast <WH1366> was from Aroer <WH6177>, that is on the bank <WH8193> of the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769>, and the city <WH5892> that is in the midst <WH8432> of the river <WH5158>, and all the plain <WH4334> by Medeba <WH4311>;
Heshbon <WH2809>, and all her cities <WH5892> that are in the plain <WH4334>; Dibon <WH1769>, and Bamothbaal <WH1120>, and Bethbaalmeon <WH1010>,
And YAHazah <WH3096>, and Kedemoth <WH6932>, and Mephaath <WH4158>,
And Kirjathaim <WH7156>, and Sibmah <WH7643>, and Zarethshahar <WH6890> in the mount <WH2022> of the valley <WH6010>,
And Bethpeor <WH1047>, and Ashdothpisgah <WH798> <WH8676> <WH794>, and Bethjeshimoth <WH1020>,

And all the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH4334>, and all the kingdom <WH4468> of Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, which reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> in Heshbon <WH2809>, whom Mosheh <WH4872> smote <WH5221> <WH8689> with the princes <WH5387> of Midian <WH4080>, Evi <WH189>, and Rekem <WH7552>, and Zur <WH6698>, and Hur <WH2354>, and Reba <WH7254>, which were dukes <WH5257> of Sichon <WH5511>, dwelling <WH3427> <WH8802> in the country <WH776>.

Balaam <WH1109> also the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160>, the soothsayer <WH7080> <WH8802>, did the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> slay <WH2026> <WH8804> with the sword <WH2719> among them <WH413> that were slain <WH2491> by them.

And the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> was Yarden <WH3383>, and the border <WH1366> thereof. This was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> after their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> and the villages <WH2691> thereof.
And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> inheritance unto the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, even unto the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their coast <WH1366> was Jazer <WH3270>, and all the cities <WH5892> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, and half <WH2677> the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, unto Aroer <WH6177> that is before <WH6440> Rabbah <WH7237>;
And from Heshbon <WH2809> unto Ramathmizpeh <WH7434>, and Betonim <WH993>; and from Mahanaim <WH4266> unto the border <WH1366> of Debir <WH1688>;

And in the valley <WH6010>, Betharam <WH1027>, and Bethnimrah <WH1039>, and Sukkot <WH5523>, and Zaphon <WH6829>, the rest <WH3499> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, Yarden <WH3383> and his border <WH1366>, even unto the edge <WH7097> of the sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> after their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892>, and their villages <WH2691>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> inheritance unto the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519>: and this was the possession of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> by their families <WH4940>.

And their coast <WH1366> was from Mahanaim <WH4266>, all Bashan <WH1316>, all the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, and all the towns <WH2333> of Jair <WH2971>, which are in Bashan <WH1316>, threescore <WH8346> cities <WH5892>:

And half <WH2677> Gil`ad <WH1568>, and Ashtaroth <WH6252>, and Edrei <WH154>, cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>, were pertaining unto the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, even to the one half <WH2677> of the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> by their families <WH4940>.

These are the countries which Mosheh <WH4872> did distribute for inheritance <WH5157> <WH8765> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124>, on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, by Yericho <WH3405>, eastward <WH4217>.

But unto the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> not any inheritance <WH5159>: the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> was their inheritance <WH5159>, as he said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them.
